00104 - (id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)aFrame
00105 {
00106     self = [super initWithFrame:aFrame];
00107     
00108     if (self)
00109     {
00110         _items = [];
00111         _content = [];
00112         
00113         _cachedItems = [];
00114         
00115         _itemSize = CGSizeMakeZero();
00116         _minItemSize = CGSizeMakeZero();
00117         _maxItemSize = CGSizeMakeZero();
00118 
00119         [self setBackgroundColors:nil];
00120 
00121         _verticalMargin = 5.0;
00122         _tileWidth = -1.0;
00123         
00124         _selectionIndexes = [CPIndexSet indexSet];
00125         _allowsEmptySelection = YES;
00126         _isSelectable = YES;
00127     }
00128     
00129     return self;
00130 }

00136 - (void)setItemPrototype:(CPCollectionViewItem)anItem
00137 {
00138     _cachedItems = [];
00139     _itemData = nil;
00140     _itemForDragging = nil;
00141     _itemPrototype = anItem;
00142 
00143     [self reloadContent];
00144 }
00145 
00149 - (CPCollectionViewItem)itemPrototype
00150 {
00151     return _itemPrototype;
00152 }
00153 
00158 - (CPCollectionViewItem)newItemForRepresentedObject:(id)anObject
00159 {
00160     var item = nil;
00161 
00162     if (_cachedItems.length)
00163         item = _cachedItems.pop();
00164 
00165     else
00166     {
00167         if (!_itemData)
00168             if (_itemPrototype)
00169                 _itemData = [CPKeyedArchiver archivedDataWithRootObject:_itemPrototype];
00170 
00171         item = [CPKeyedUnarchiver unarchiveObjectWithData:_itemData];
00172     }
00173 
00174     [item setRepresentedObject:anObject];
00175     [[item view] setFrameSize:_itemSize];
00176 
00177     return item;
00178 }

00205 {
00206     if (_content == anArray)
00207         return;
00208     
00209     _content = anArray;
00210     
00211     [self reloadContent];
00212 }

00230 // Setting the Selection Mode
00235 - (void)setSelectable:(BOOL)isSelectable
00236 {
00237     if (_isSelectable == isSelectable)
00238         return;
00239     
00240     _isSelectable = isSelectable;
00241     
00242     if (!_isSelectable)
00243     {
00244         var index = CPNotFound;
00245         
00246         while ((index = [_selectionIndexes indexGreaterThanIndex:index]) != CPNotFound)
00247             [_items[index] setSelected:NO];
00248     }
00249 }
00250

00256 {
00257     return _isSelectable;
00258 }

00298 - (void)setSelectionIndexes:(CPIndexSet)anIndexSet
00299 {
00300     if (_selectionIndexes == anIndexSet || !_isSelectable)
00301         return;
00302     
00303     var index = CPNotFound;
00304     
00305     while ((index = [_selectionIndexes indexGreaterThanIndex:index]) != CPNotFound)
00306         [_items[index] setSelected:NO];
00307     
00308     _selectionIndexes = anIndexSet;
00309     
00310     var index = CPNotFound;
00311     
00312     while ((index = [_selectionIndexes indexGreaterThanIndex:index]) != CPNotFound)
00313         [_items[index] setSelected:YES];
00314     
00315     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(collectionViewDidChangeSelection:)])
00316         [_delegate collectionViewDidChangeSelection:self]
00317 }
00318 
00322 - (CPIndexSet)selectionIndexes
00323 {
00324     return [_selectionIndexes copy];
00325 }

00327 /* @ignore */
00328 - (void)reloadContent
00329 {   
00330     // Remove current views
00331     var count = _items.length;
00332     
00333     while (count--)
00334     {
00335         [[_items[count] view] removeFromSuperview];
00336         [_items[count] setSelected:NO];
00337 
00338         _cachedItems.push(_items[count]);
00339     }
00340     
00341     _items = [];
00342 
00343     if (!_itemPrototype || !_content)
00344         return;
00345 
00346     var index = 0;
00347 
00348     count = _content.length;
00349 
00350     for (; index < count; ++index)
00351     {
00352         _items.push([self newItemForRepresentedObject:_content[index]]);
00353     
00354         [self addSubview:[_items[index] view]];
00355     }
00356 
00357     index = CPNotFound;
00358     while ((index = [_selectionIndexes indexGreaterThanIndex:index]) != CPNotFound)
00359         [_items[index] setSelected:YES];
00360 
00361     [self tile];
00362 }
00363 
00364 /* @ignore */
00365 - (void)tile
00366 {
00367     var width = CGRectGetWidth([self bounds]);
00368 
00369     if (![_content count] || width == _tileWidth)
00370         return;
00371 
00372     // We try to fit as many views per row as possible.  Any remaining space is then 
00373     // either proportioned out to the views (if their minSize != maxSize) or used as
00374     // margin
00375     var itemSize = CGSizeMakeCopy(_minItemSize);
00376 
00377     _numberOfColumns = MAX(1.0, FLOOR(width / itemSize.width));
00378 
00379     if (_maxNumberOfColumns > 0)
00380         _numberOfColumns = MIN(_maxNumberOfColumns, _numberOfColumns);
00381 
00382     var nbItems = [_items count];
00383     if (_numberOfColumns > nbItems)
00384         _numberOfColumns = nbItems;
00385 
00386     var maxItemSize = CGSizeMakeCopy(_maxItemSize);
00387     if (maxItemSize.width==0)
00388         maxItemSize.width = FLOOR(width / _numberOfColumns);
00389 
00390    var remaining = width - _numberOfColumns * itemSize.width,
00391         itemsNeedSizeUpdate = NO;
00392         
00393     if (remaining > 0 && itemSize.width < _maxItemSize.width)
00394         itemSize.width = MIN(_maxItemSize.width, itemSize.width + FLOOR(remaining / _numberOfColumns));
00395     
00396     // When we ONE column and a non-integral width, the FLOORing above can cause the item width to be smaller than the total width.
00397     if (_maxNumberOfColumns == 1 && itemSize.width < _maxItemSize.width && itemSize.width < width)
00398         itemSize.width = MIN(_maxItemSize.width, width);
00399     
00400     if (!CGSizeEqualToSize(_itemSize, itemSize))
00401     {
00402         _itemSize = itemSize;
00403         itemsNeedSizeUpdate = YES;
00404     }
00405     
00406     var index = 0,
00407         count = _items.length;
00408     
00409     if (_maxNumberOfColumns > 0 && _maxNumberOfRows > 0)
00410         count = MIN(count, _maxNumberOfColumns * _maxNumberOfRows);
00411     
00412     _numberOfRows = CEIL(count / _numberOfColumns);
00413 
00414     _horizontalMargin = FLOOR((width - _numberOfColumns * itemSize.width) / (_numberOfColumns + 1));
00415         
00416     var x = _horizontalMargin,
00417         y = -itemSize.height;
00418     
00419     for (; index < count; ++index)
00420     {
00421         if (index % _numberOfColumns == 0)
00422         {
00423             x = 0;
00424             y += _verticalMargin + itemSize.height;
00425         }
00426         
00427         var view = [_items[index] view];
00428         
00429         [view setFrameOrigin:CGPointMake(x, y)];
00430         [view setFrameSize:CGSizeMake([self frameSize].width, [view frameSize].height)];
00431 
00432                 if (itemsNeedSizeUpdate)
00433             [view setFrameSize:_itemSize];
00434             
00435         x += itemSize.width;
00436     }
00437     
00438     _tileWidth = width;
00439     [self setFrameSize:CGSizeMake(width, y + itemSize.height + _verticalMargin)];
00440     _tileWidth = -1.0;
00441 }

00443 - (void)resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:(CGSize)aSize
00444 {
00445     [self tile];
00446 }

00514 - (void)setMinItemSize:(CGSize)aSize
00515 {

00517         return;
00518

00520     
00521     [self tile];

00554 - (void)setBackgroundColors:(CPArray)backgroundColors
00555 {
00556     if (_backgroundColors === backgroundColors)
00557         return;
00558 
00559     _backgroundColors = backgroundColors;
00560 
00561     if (!_backgroundColors)
00562         _backgroundColors = [CPColor whiteColor];
00563 
00564     if ([_backgroundColors count] === 1)
00565         [self setBackgroundColor:_backgroundColors[0]];
00566 
00567     else
00568         [self setBackgroundColor:nil];
00569 
00570     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00571 }

00578 - (void)mouseUp:(CPEvent)anEvent
00579 {
00580     if ([_selectionIndexes count] && [anEvent clickCount] == 2 && [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(collectionView:didDoubleClickOnItemAtIndex:)])
00581         [_delegate collectionView:self didDoubleClickOnItemAtIndex:[_selectionIndexes firstIndex]];
00582 }
00583 
00584 - (void)mouseDown:(CPEvent)anEvent
00585 {
00586     _mouseDownEvent = anEvent;
00587 
00588     var location = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil],
00589         row = FLOOR(location.y / (_itemSize.height + _verticalMargin)),
00590         column = FLOOR(location.x / (_itemSize.width + _horizontalMargin)),
00591         index = row * _numberOfColumns + column;
00592 
00593     if (index >= 0 && index < _items.length)
00594         [self setSelectionIndexes:[CPIndexSet indexSetWithIndex:index]];
00595 
00596     else if (_allowsEmptySelection)
00597         [self setSelectionIndexes:[CPIndexSet indexSet]];
00598 }
00599 
00600 - (void)mouseDragged:(CPEvent)anEvent
00601 {
00602     if (![_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(collectionView:dragTypesForItemsAtIndexes:)])
00603         return;
00604 
00605     // If we don't have any selected items, we've clicked away, and thus the drag is meaningless.
00606     if (![_selectionIndexes count])
00607         return;
00608 
00609     // Set up the pasteboard
00610     var dragTypes = [_delegate collectionView:self dragTypesForItemsAtIndexes:_selectionIndexes];
00611 
00612     [[CPPasteboard pasteboardWithName:CPDragPboard] declareTypes:dragTypes owner:self];
00613 
00614     var point = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00615 
00616     if (!_itemForDragging)
00617         _itemForDragging = [self newItemForRepresentedObject:_content[[_selectionIndexes firstIndex]]];
00618     else
00619         [_itemForDragging setRepresentedObject:_content[[_selectionIndexes firstIndex]]];
00620 
00621     var view = [_itemForDragging view];
00622 
00623     [view setFrameSize:_itemSize];
00624     [view setAlphaValue:0.7];
00625 
00626     [self dragView:view
00627         at:[[_items[[_selectionIndexes firstIndex]] view] frame].origin
00628         offset:CGSizeMakeZero()
00629         event:_mouseDownEvent
00630         pasteboard:nil
00631         source:self
00632         slideBack:YES];
00633 }
00634 
00640 - (void)pasteboard:(CPPasteboard)aPasteboard provideDataForType:(CPString)aType
00641 {
00642     [aPasteboard setData:[_delegate collectionView:self dataForItemsAtIndexes:_selectionIndexes forType:aType] forType:aType];
00643 }

00690 var CPCollectionViewMinItemSizeKey      = @"CPCollectionViewMinItemSizeKey",
00691     CPCollectionViewMaxItemSizeKey      = @"CPCollectionViewMaxItemSizeKey",
00692     CPCollectionViewVerticalMarginKey   = @"CPCollectionViewVerticalMarginKey",
00693     CPCollectionViewSelectableKey       = @"CPCollectionViewSelectableKey",
00694     CPCollectionViewBackgroundColorsKey = @"CPCollectionViewBackgroundColorsKey";

00697 @implementation CPCollectionView (CPCoding)
00698 
00699 - (id)initWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00700 {
00701     self = [super initWithCoder:aCoder];
00702 
00703     if (self)
00704     {
00705         _items = [];
00706         _content = [];
00707 
00708         _cachedItems = [];
00709 
00710         _itemSize = CGSizeMakeZero();
00711         
00712         _minItemSize = [aCoder decodeSizeForKey:CPCollectionViewMinItemSizeKey] || CGSizeMakeZero();
00713         _maxItemSize = [aCoder decodeSizeForKey:CPCollectionViewMaxItemSizeKey] || CGSizeMakeZero();
00714         
00715         _verticalMargin = [aCoder decodeFloatForKey:CPCollectionViewVerticalMarginKey];
00716         
00717         _isSelectable = [aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPCollectionViewSelectableKey];
00718 
00719         [self setBackgroundColors:[aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPCollectionViewBackgroundColorsKey]];
00720           
00721         _tileWidth = -1.0;
00722 
00723         _selectionIndexes = [CPIndexSet indexSet];
00724         
00725         _allowsEmptySelection = YES;
00726     }
00727 
00728     return self;
00729 }
00730 
00731 - (void)encodeWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00732 {
00733     [super encodeWithCoder:aCoder];
00734 
00735     if (!CGSizeEqualToSize(_minItemSize, CGSizeMakeZero()))
00736       [aCoder encodeSize:_minItemSize forKey:CPCollectionViewMinItemSizeKey];
00737     
00738     if (!CGSizeEqualToSize(_maxItemSize, CGSizeMakeZero()))
00739       [aCoder encodeSize:_maxItemSize forKey:CPCollectionViewMaxItemSizeKey];
00740     
00741     [aCoder encodeBool:_isSelectable forKey:CPCollectionViewSelectableKey];
00742     
00743     [aCoder encodeFloat:_verticalMargin forKey:CPCollectionViewVerticalMarginKey];
00744 
00745     [aCoder encodeObject:_backgroundColors forKey:CPCollectionViewBackgroundColorsKey];
00746 }
